description: Explore the fundamental concepts of music theory, including notation, scales, chords, and basic harmony. This course is suitable for beginners with no prior knowledge of music theory.
Learn the basics of playing the piano from scratch. Topics covered include hand positioning, reading sheet music, and playing simple melodies. No prior experience required.
Take your guitar skills to the next level with this intermediate-level masterclass. Explore advanced chords, techniques, and improvisation. Prior experience with basic guitar playing required.
Dive into the world of electronic music production with this hands-on course. Learn how to use digital audio workstations (DAWs), create beats, synthesize sounds, and arrange tracks.

course_name: Music History: Baroque to Romantic Era
description: Explore the rich history of Western classical music from the Baroque period to the Romantic era. Learn about prominent composers, musical forms, and significant works from each period.
Unlock your creativity and learn the art of songwriting. Explore lyric writing, melody construction, song structure, and techniques for generating ideas.
Develop your improvisational skills in the context of jazz music. Learn essential scales, chord progressions, and soloing techniques used in jazz improvisation.
Instructor and duration information not available.
